thought: The PostgreSQL executeQuery action requires the 'query' parameter to be a plain string, not an expression, and it must be provided in the params dictionary. The previous attempt to use an expression in params failed. I will fix this by setting the 'query' param directly to the cleaned SQL query string without expression syntax.
plan: Set the 'query' param to the cleaned SQL query string directly (no expression)
Set 'options' param to an empty dict
Test the PostgreSQL query execution after setting correct params
criticism: Previously, I used expression syntax in the 'query' param which is unsupported. Now I will provide the raw string directly to avoid errors.

tool_input.comments: Execute the SQL query generated by AI with correct raw string params including query and options
